attributes.action: To stop tour operators overcharging families in school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a dad of 6 year old twin girls. I have travelled around the world and seen some lovely places. I now find that when myself and my family would like to take a holiday we have to take out a bank loan or a second mortgage just to go to spain for 2 weeks. Why is this ???. I think it is the " old supply & demand yarn ". We will have to go in this period because it is the school holidays - so we will have to pay these over inflated prices.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
